## Tentang Data
Data di ambil dari komentar yang diberikan oleh pengunduh aplikasi gojek di playstore. 


## Library

```{r}
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(stringr)
library(tm)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Import Data

```{r}
dirwd <- paste(getwd(),"/wrangled data proj-2/",sep='')
daftar_petisi <- read.csv(paste(dirwd,"daftar petisi ttg gojek.csv",sep=''), 
                     header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
petisi_gojek <- read.csv(paste(dirwd,"petisi-gojek.csv",sep=''), 
                     header = TRUE, sep = ",", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```
